Text:
@ sinner77

One question mate ! there are some movies ( like this one - old movies ) original prints are not good ! so after compression ( khela ghar is just impossible to compress ) those prints are not suitable for watch ! so what to do ? i need your response ! thanks..

Dear Robin

What stands u out frm the rest of the crowd is the SIZE of ur ups.It helps people like me with low bandwith to watch gud bengali movies in very decent qlty.
So if after compressing some of the old movies if the qlty is bad i think it is better to skip.
Just keep uploading in the small size
I am also very happy to know of ur pedigree frm ur previous comments....my respect for u has gone up a notch or two!!
thks
take care

@ sinner77

Ok boss ! then take a single classic / day ( except new movie release ! ) thnx..
god looks a classic to me..too bad i can't understand it:(...but really thanful to see the pic
